snippet: Andray Blatche, who is not being accused of any wrongdoing, was among three men and three women who were together inside a room at the Nets’ hotel.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets forward Andray Blatche is questioned by police as a witness in a sexual assault case in Philadelphia; is not accused of any wrongdoing and remains in team's rotation.

byline.original: By HOWARD BECK and WENDY RUDERMAN
byline.contributor: Zach Schonbrun contributed reporting from Philadelphia.

lead_paragraph: Andray Blatche, who is not being accused of any wrongdoing, was among three men and three women who were together inside a room at the Nets’ hotel.

headline.seo: Blatche Questioned as Witness in Sexual Assault, but Is Not Charged
headline.main: Nets’ Blatche Questioned as Witness in Sexual Assault Case in Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Blatche Questioned as Witness in Sexual Assault Case in Philadelphia
